SYSTEM: Metodolog%C3%ADa-1-v2%28asun%29.pdf: Página 41
Ontology Requirements Specification. Task 5
 Input: the list of CQs
 Objective: obtaining different groups of CQs
 Techniques: Card Sorting when the grouping is
 Techniques: Card Sorting, when the grouping is
done manually, and Clustering NL sentences or
Information Extraction when the grouping is done
automatically
 Tools: MindMap Tools or Cicero Tool (for
distributed teams)
 Output: a set of groups including CQs
 Hybrid approach:

The analysis of the frequency of terms and the
grouping of CQs based on those terms that
have a higher frequency.

The use of pre-established categories, such as
time and date
units of measure
currencies
time and date, units of measure, currencies,
location, languages, etc.
© A. Gómez Pérez, M.C. Suárez-Figueroa, B. Villazón
41
Ontological Engineering
Slide 41
speaker: SYSTEM
